In this project, I will be examining some of the predictors of literacy using the world bank data. 

# Setup
```{r Load packages, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse) # data wrangling
library(broom) # data wrangling
library(ggplot2) # graph plotting
library(car) # regression
library(lmtest) # regression
```

```{r Load data file, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# Load file
dataset <- read.csv("Literacy.csv", header = TRUE, na.strings=c(""," ","NA")) 
```
